name: The Doom that Came to Sarnath
name_original: The Doom that Came to Sarnath
description:
Submission for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 182 Theme: Cthuhlu Description

Seek vengeance over the destruction of Ib, 1,000 years after the event, because as an omnipotent God, time has no real meaning to you...

Extremely loosely based on the "Doom that came to Sarnath" Fantasy Story by H.P. Lovecraft.

Controls GamePad

- Analogue Stick to move.

- Normal Attack / Menu Select

- Special Attack

Keyboard

WASD to Move

"K" or Spacebar - Normal Attack / Menu Select

"L" or Enter - Special Attack

Credits

1-Bit Art Asset Pack by Kenney Assets - https://kenney.nl

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
